titleStmt.title: J. C. Beeman to James W. Tate
CWG7792

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, James F. Robinson: Appointments by the Governor, Civil Appointments, 1862-1863

body.p:
Louisvile Ky 10 Nov 1862
J. W. Tate
Assistant Secty of State of Ky
Dear Sir

My friends Benjamin Rankin and Oren F. Miner of Jefferson County wish to procure Commissions as Notaries Public for this county. You will please send them Commissions to Louisville, Care of Edgar Needham, Esqr, Box 1020 I know and am satisfied that they are both duly qualified to discharge the duties of same
By attending to this you will confer a favor on
You May send both in one envelope if you see proper, Care of Edgar Needam Box 1020

Jefferson Co
Notaries Public
Benj Rankin
O. F. Miner
Appd Nov 11. 1862
